title: Freedom4All
author: Freedom4All
content: Hi,I give away a freebee to a reputable member here on the forum.Give me the text you want to translate to another language and I will deliver quality translation!Got to give away some stuff sometimes!

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on July 01, 2023, 05:45:24 AMHi,I give away a freebee to a reputable member here on the forum.Give me the text you want to translate to another language and I will deliver quality translation!Got to give away some stuff sometimes!Seems like a good offer, but can you please mention that in how many languages you can translate the text? Because as a human we could only translate into the languages that we know fully, and that's why you should mention that what are those many languages that you can translate the text into. I hope you are not going to by other online available translators for the job because nowadays anyone can use those translating sites without any issues.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on July 01, 2023, 05:45:24 AMHi,I give away a freebee to a reputable member here on the forum.Give me the text you want to translate to another language and I will deliver quality translation!Got to give away some stuff sometimes!Are you going to use a translator tool to do this I doubt if you knew a lot of languages because you did not specify the languages where you are good at, why not just post translation tools that you are using so we'll know how good it is, this is a much better give away, you know sharing is caring and much better than giveaways.

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: The piece of text will be translated and proofread by a human who speaks the language because it is his/her mothertongue.

comments.author: Hamich124D
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on July 02, 2023, 08:10:48 PMThe piece of text will be translated and proofread by a human who speaks the language because it is his/her mothertongue.Who is this human, You ? Or are you running some sort of a marketing agency, which in this case you should probably disclose it.

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: Strange. Just test me out?What harm can be done? Just observe what I deliver.
